entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets near midnight then to periods of light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
